attributes.title: This app was AWFUL
attributes.review: I opened the app and immediately I got bombarded with fake tan and an attitude. Iâ€™m still wiping orange off my screen to this day. I think that maybe this app needs a full scrub down by 3,000 mr.clean magic erasers. Other than the initial incident, going through the app is way worse. Everything I click gave   me error messages like â€œManny Flag 2020â€ or â€œJudy-Moody-Fo-Footyâ€ and I was really confused. I feel like this app needs some serious work or to be taken down in general. Itâ€™s horrible.

attributes.title: SAD. NOT GOOD. WEAK. VERY BAD.
attributes.review:
HELLO!

DEFINITELY NOT STRONG, PASSIONATE, TOUGH, OR AND ADULT.

this app made me fall of the eiffel tower and poop myself at the same time. when i tell you i got so scared when a cheeto with hair popped up on my screen I AM NOT LYING. this app is traumatizing. that cheeto comes to haunt you in your nightmares. it's so wrinkly. the split ends on the hair are so split. there's even a v*gina in the cheeto's neck--you don't even have to look closely to see that. and i heard the cheeto is an oompa loompa body butt female dog. this app is just ...wow so scary. it's more scary than ordering for yourself in a restaurant! do not get
